title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point – Placonia imports the good

1 point – The domestic opportunity cost of producing good X is higher than the world price (PW) for unit JN. Or, they can get it cheaper at the world price.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/2 point(s)

1 point – Placonia imports the good

1 point – The domestic opportunity cost of producing good X is higher than the world price (PW) for unit JN. Or, they can get it cheaper at the world price.

Student receives 1/2 point(s)

1 point – Placonia imports the good

1 point – The domestic opportunity cost of producing good X is higher than the world price (PW) for unit JN. Or, they can get it cheaper at the world price.

Student receives 2/2 point(s)

1 point – Placonia imports the good

1 point – The domestic opportunity cost of producing good X is higher than the world price (PW) for unit JN. Or, they can get it cheaper at the world price.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: 1 point: They import 300 (=350 - 50) units or JN units
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

1 point: They import 300 (=350 - 50) units or JN units

Student receives 1/1 point(s)

1 point: They import 300 (=350 - 50) units or JN units

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point – Consumer surplus decreases from PwNH to PtMH, or a decrease of MNPWPt

1 point – Producer surplus increases by JKPtPW
descriptions:
Student receives 0/2 point(s)

1 point – Consumer surplus decreases from PwNH to PtMH, or a decrease of MNPWPt

1 point – Producer surplus increases by JKPtPW

Student receives 2/2 point(s)

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: 1 point: Employment would increase because domestic production of good X increases in Placonia
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

1 point: Employment would increase because domestic production of good X increases in Placonia

Student receives 1/1 point(s)

1 point: Employment would increase because domestic production of good X increases in Placonia
